blog.name: lasiovi
blog.description:
|28 yeas old |Finland|
Kpop fan|Eurovision fan | wannabe writer| TV shows/soaps trash| Batchelor of social services
 | Master of running from my problems|

summary: There is this thing I have wanted to write since the Skam og but I will do it now. For me I have always felt this special...
body:
There is this thing I have wanted to write since the Skam og but I will do it now. For me I have always felt this special connection with Isak/Lucas because my mom has a BPD and I have been like Isak/Lucas. The stigma with MI is so big I remember when i was teenager I didn’t want anyone to know my mom was in clinic.. I never talked about it with anyone.. So I have always understood why Isak/Lucas said those things about his mom..I know how offensive it feels but I can see the place where those things are coming from.

 and it’ It doesn’t mean he doesn’t love his mom.. but when you don’t have mom in your life because this stupid disease .. you hate that thing, the disease not the person.. so that is Isak/Lucas coping mechanism *I don’t need crazy people in my life..* He doesn’t mean it. He need his mom in his life and want her in his life. he wouldn’t be texting her otherwise. But it’s much more easier to handle that your mom can’t be that kind of parent as you would need when you push them away.. been there..there are only certain amount of things that you can handle when you are teenager and we really don’t know what things did happened before Lucas moved out from his home.. or how his childhood has been.. Let’s  just be real for a second it’s not uwu, soft to have mental disorder.. it’s a struggle, it’s something you have to learn to life with and you have to treat it as any other illness. There are bad days there are good days..

Right now Lucas thinks bipolarity is a reason he can’t be with Eliott.. The reasons Lucas is feeling miserable again.. because he was told he was nothing to Eliott except a symptom..  that’s why he says it like that today.. that everything is shit because Eliott is bipolar because he thinks that is the reason they can never be together.. Lucas have had one of the scariest experiences in his life just a two days ago.. he has been scared to death for Eliott and told afterwards he means nothing to that person he has fallen so deeply in love.. It will take time him to clear his mind after that.. we should have mercy on him not to be able to handle it the best cinnamon roll way possible. Lucas has been struggling to handle his feels toward his mom and now he does that same with Eliott..he will read and hopefully be told by several people that MI is not obstacle to have a relationship.. and by time he will learn also that parents with MI can be good parents when they are stable, like my mom whom I love a lot <3 She had her struggles when I was a teenager and she was not the best mom but it was not her fault and I’m happy she  did find the things that helped her and that she is in a good place now.  And I think that is one of the important points why Isak’s mom accepted him without questions when he came out and hopefully same will go with Lucas.. Because everyone has held a prejudge against her and it was shown wrong. She is and can be the supportive parent that he needs the most in that moment. 

I know this subject is a sensitive one. I know that it’s easy to cancel Lucas or call him out after today but there are this place where he is right now and it’s part because of his history we shouldn’t forget.. also please don’t understate the struggles of the kids whose parents haven’t always been the most stable..the struggles Lucas has had.. Because he has been trying to deal a big things all alone for a long time.. and it is a long journey without right kind of support system I would know.. but he will get there I promise. I did too.

summary: (spoilers for clips I guess?) If I checked Jeremy's screengrab correctly for this episode, we have 4/5 clips left. The next one...
question: (spoilers for clips I guess?) If I checked Jeremy's screengrab correctly for this episode, we have 4/5 clips left. The next one will be about the same length as the one where Manon revealed everything (I'm guessing where people call him out about how MI =/= not being able to love), the one after about a minute long (maybe where he texts/talks to his mom?),  and then there's maybe a super short clip (about 40 sec), and the last one should be around 5/6mins.
answer:
Anon counting the clips here. Actually, there should be a 3mins clip before the longer clip that should be about 4mins.

sjfsjhfsjh i get so stressed by these kind of calculations, because it says nothing about when it will take place and what will happen, but if we keep in mind how much time we got left (i think it’s around 15 min now? 14?) this could be accurate.

summary: How is it transphobic if you are attracted to cisgender men only?People don't choose who they are attracted to,it is involuntary...
body: How is it transphobic if you are attracted to cisgender men only?People don’t choose who they are attracted to,it is involuntary and it isn’t transphobic for someone not to date trans people.Also this cancel culture is ridiculous.

summary: Neils is on holiday so that’s why he hasn’t posted any bts but he intends to when he returns :) I don’t think they’re staying...
question: Neils is on holiday so that’s why he hasn’t posted any bts but he intends to when he returns :) I don’t think they’re staying away from fandom, David still constantly posts fandom posts on insta like he always has!
answer: Ah, that explains a lot then! And I really hope they won’t, I have seen some people talking how David has taken a step back from the fandom after that Disneyland comment and the backlash he got apparently but looks like it’s not the case tho.

reblog.comment: Ah, that explains a lot then! And I really hope they won’t, I have seen some people talking how David has taken a step back from the fandom after that Disneyland comment and the backlash he got apparently but looks like it’s not the case tho.

blog.name: aurthurscheekbones
blog.title: AM I A JOKE TO U?
blog.description: never in the right mood at the right time|since 1997

body:
ok then but I think doin this .. this takin every single god damn thing too hard isn’t fair .. I mean I have bout male and female trans friends and I’m a kind of so sensitive on people’s use of words person but not still feelin like it was transophobe .. IDK I should ask my trans friends then if it really offendes them or not .cuz even if Lucas was sayin like trans mans aren’t my type as well ,he had the right to without bein transophobe ..he never said like trans mans aren’t real man or bla bla he just said havin an other x chromosome isn’t his type .as a bisexual I know that I’m not going to be in a relationship with a transgender it’s not about being a transophobe it’s about the fuckin personal taste on people u like to be in rel/have sex with and yeah my trans friends always complaining about how hard it is when they’re not mostly other’s type because of being a trans and sayin like he has no right te be like “trans men aren’t my taste” U are becoming some kind of parents with “u have no right to not have feelings for guys with green eyes cuz u r into guys anyway "but not liking to be in rell with green eye men doesn’t make that kid a greeneyephobe like ” green eyed guys aren’t guys with real eyes “ thing .u get it? and still he didn’t say trans people are less of a man cuz they’re trans or anything like this IT WASN’T ABOUT TRANS PEOPLE AT ALL for god sake who’d started this god damn discussion?

STOP THIS

blog.name: amorgignitamore
blog.title: Amor gignit Amorem
blog.description:
Soraia |21| she/her | Portugal
I like too much stuff and love to ramble about it

tags: my thoughts on how eliott is feeling tonight
title: Lundi 1:24
body:
Eliott lays on his sofa turning every 5 seconds to find a comfortable position to sleep. It’s not that his sofa is uncomfortable but he is uncomfortable. Every time he closes his eyes, images of distant worried blue eyes, police cars, ambulances, and concerned parents, flash his mind. Thoughts that run too fast and too loud. Only one word in his thoughts is understandable: Lucas. Thinking about him doesn’t calm him like before, instead, his mind gets even faster and the pain grows bigger. What does Lucas think of him now? Does he hate him?

Maybe drawing could calm him down but all his papers are filled with images of sad raccoons and hedgehogs and that didn’t help. Maybe music. Music like the one Lucas played on his piano. The same piano that’s now in his line of vision. He wishes his parents weren’t sleeping in his bed, at least that room doesn’t have a Lucas presence in every bit of it like the living room does. 

He thinks about the record player, but that carries too many memories and his body feels too heavy and too tired to get up. His phone becomes the last resort. The phone he has been avoiding ever since Lucas answered his text. He opens the playlist of songs that remind him of his love, the same one he was going to show Lucas during the weekend that turned into a hospital bed, parents crying and more medication. 

His finger brushes over Alt-j’s Nara and the song starts playing. He places the phone under his pillow and puts it on the lowest setting possible so his parents don’t wake up. The lyrics make him hold his breath “Comes/Saut dans le vide, my lover/In my youth the greatest tide washed up my prize/You” “I’ve discovered a man like no other man/I’ve found a love to love like no other can”. It’s like a love letter he would have written to Lucas. The song is no lullaby but is enough to make Eliott’s thoughts slow down, so he puts the song on repeat. After the 10th time, his eyes finally start to feel heavy with only the thought of his lover in mind dozing him off to sleep.
